original: Österberg, Svante Justinus, härads-slkrivare, Mariestad, f. 30/1/91 i Kristianstad av förv. Theofil Ö. o. Ida Lundström. G. m. Maja Svensson. Barn: Karin f. 30, Lars o. Sven 33. — Studiex. i Lund 16, jur. stud. Tyg. v. länsstyr. i Mariestad fr. 20 s. lands-kont., hiäradsskriv. i Mariestads fögd. 46. Ordf. i tax :nd fr. 18, sekr. i Vads-bo hemib:- o. fornmifören., int. v. Vads,bo mus. Skr.: Marieholm o. dess landshövdingar (33), Skarab. 1. brand-st :bol. 1842-1942, Mariestads sparb. 1821-1946, div. upps. o. tidn:art. Hobby: ’hemb :forskn. Skarab. brandst:-bol. ftjGM 42.
translated: Österberg, Svante Justinus, district clerk, Mariestad, born on January 30, 1891 in Kristianstad, son of Theofil Ö. and Ida Lundström. Married to Maja Svensson. Children: Karin born in 1930, Lars and Sven born in 1933. Completed studies in Lund in 1916, studied law. Employed by the county government in Mariestad from 1920 as a regional clerk. Chairman of the tax committee since 1918, secretary of the Vads-bo home improvement and antiquarian society, member of the Vads-bo museum board. Author of "Marieholm and its governors" (1933), "Skaraborg Fire Brigade 1842-1942", "Mariestad Savings Bank 1821-1946", various essays and newspaper articles. Hobby: genealogy research. Member of the Skaraborg Fire Brigade Medal (1942).

structured.name: Svante Justinus Österberg

organizations.title: Secretary
organizations.namedPosition: Vads-bo Home Improvement and Antiquarian Society

structured.description: Swedish district clerk, known for writing about Marieholm and its governors, and the history of Skaraborg Fire Brigade and Mariestad Savings Bank.
